entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:26 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
